name: ForgottenMix - Anime
description:
To begin with, English is not my mother tongue, so I apologize in advance if there is any mistake.

I think this chekpoint is pretty generic and lack personality (i'll make up for it on the next one, haha) but i upload it anyway, i know some of you are awesome and can make it shine =).

I think this checkpoint can be unstable sometimes with some Loras.

Most of the images I posted have been inpainted (character faces).

Personnal recommendations (Feel free to experiment):

Image Size: 512x512 / 512x768 (768x512 can be really unstable).

Sampling method: DPM++ 2M SDE Karras / DPM++ 2M Karras / Euler a

Sampling steps: 30

Upscaler: ScuNET PSNR

Hires steps: 20

Denoising strengh: 0.51

Clip skip: 1 / 2 / 3 (I think 1 is better)

Negative prompt: (worst quality, low quality, normal quality), (outline:1.3).

You can try to play with Clip skip and "(worst quality, low quality, normal quality), (outline:1.3)" strengh. It will alterate the output for a more or less anime style.

Please, don't use restore face.

Please, please, experiment and show me what my checkpoint is capable of !
